markdown.markdown:
Hello

T·ªïng quan ƒê∆∞·ª£c xem tr·ª±c ti·∫øp

```{r}
#| label: library
#| include: false
# C√†i ƒë·∫∑t v√† t·∫£i g√≥i c·∫ßn thi·∫øt

# üì¶ C√†i & n·∫°p c√°c g√≥i c·∫ßn thi·∫øt b·∫±ng pacman
if (!require("pacman")) install.packages("pacman")
pacman::p_load(janeaustenr, gutenbergr, dplyr, tidytext, stringr, ggplot2, flextable)
```
```{r}
# T·∫°o d·ªØ li·ªáu c√≥ s·ªë d√≤ng v√† s·ªë ch∆∞∆°ng
original_books <- austen_books() %>%
  mutate(
    linenumber = row_number(),
    chapter = cumsum(str_detect(text, "^chapter [\\divxlc]"))
  )

# ƒê·∫øm s·ªë d√≤ng m·ªói ch∆∞∆°ng trong t·ª´ng cu·ªën s√°ch
chapter_summary <- original_books %>%
  count(book, chapter, name = "s·ªë_d√≤ng") %>%
  arrange(book, chapter)

# Hi·ªÉn th·ªã b·∫±ng flextable
flextable(chapter_summary) %>%
  set_header_labels(
    book = "T√™n s√°ch",
    chapter = "Ch∆∞∆°ng",
    s·ªë_d√≤ng = "S·ªë d√≤ng"
  ) %>%
  autofit()
```

# l·ªçc s√°ch hi·ªÉn th·ªã 
```{r}
# T·∫°o d·ªØ li·ªáu g·ªëc
original_books <- austen_books() %>%
  mutate(
    linenumber = row_number(),
    chapter = cumsum(str_detect(text, "^chapter [\\divxlc]"))
  )

# Ph√¢n t√≠ch cho cu·ªën "Pride & Prejudice"
pride_summary <- original_books %>%
  filter(book == "Pride & Prejudice") %>%
  count(chapter, name = "s·ªë_d√≤ng") %>%
  arrange(chapter)

# T√≠nh ph·∫ßn trƒÉm
total_lines <- sum(pride_summary$s·ªë_d√≤ng)
pride_summary <- pride_summary %>%
  mutate(ty_le = round(100 * s·ªë_d√≤ng / total_lines, 2))

# Th√™m d√≤ng T·ªïng c·ªông
pride_total <- bind_rows(
  pride_summary,
  tibble(chapter = NA, s·ªë_d√≤ng = total_lines, ty_le = 100)
)

# T·∫°o ch·ªâ s·ªë d√≤ng c·ªßa "T·ªïng c·ªông"
total_row <- which(is.na(pride_total$chapter))

# T·∫°o b·∫£ng flextable
flextable(pride_total) %>%
  set_header_labels(
    chapter = "Ch∆∞∆°ng",
    s·ªë_d√≤ng = "S·ªë d√≤ng",
    ty_le = "T·ª∑ l·ªá (%)"
  ) %>%
  italic(i = total_row) %>%
  compose(i = total_row, j = 1, value = as_paragraph("T·ªïng c·ªông")) %>%
  align(align = "center", part = "all") %>%
  autofit()
```

```{r}
# V·∫Ω bi·ªÉu ƒë·ªì s·ªë d√≤ng theo ch∆∞∆°ng cho Pride & Prejudice üìä
ggplot(pride_summary, aes(x = chapter, y = s·ªë_d√≤ng)) +
  geom_col(fill = "steelblue") +
  labs(
    title = "S·ªë d√≤ng theo ch∆∞∆°ng - Pride & Prejudice",
    x = "Ch∆∞∆°ng",
    y = "S·ªë d√≤ng"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5),
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust = 1)
  )
```
